author: Helene Braun
title: Trump’s Truth Social Takes Next Step in Launching Spot Bitcoin ETF
description: The social media company filed an S-1 document with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trumps social media company, Truth Social, is wasting no time in trying to launch a spot bitcoin
